item.title: babel 继承 Es5
item.description: 继承 复制下面代码 - 点击https://babeljs.io/repl/ 1class b { 2 constructor(c,d){ 3 c = c+'1111'; 4 console.log(c,d); 5 } 6 start(){ 7 console.log('ba ba') 8 } 9} 10 11class a extends b { 12 constructor(c,b){ 13 super(c,b); 14 c = c+'222222'; 15 console.log(1,c,2,b); 16 return this.start; 17 } 18 start(){ 19 console.log('son'); 20 } 21} 22 23var o1 = new a('first', 'second'); 24 25console.log('------------------'); 26console.log(o1.toString()); 27 -为了实现，相当于 类的 继承 问题，js 给 大众
